Package Components

Class Sound

java.lang.Object
Components.Component
Components.Sound
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Sound
extends Component
Contains and manages multiple sounds you can add or delete
Author:
Usuario
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • addSound

      public void addSound​(java.lang.String path)
      Add a sound to be played from a file
      Parameters:
      path - of the file with name and extension. The path to the GameAssets folder is src/GameAssets/.

    • playSound

      public void playSound​(java.lang.String name, boolean fromStart, int loops)
      Play a sound.
      Parameters:
      name - File name for the sound with extension.
      fromStart - Whether to play from start or resume playing.
      loops - Whether the sound sound will loop.

    • stopSound

      public void stopSound​(java.lang.String name)
      Stop a sound.
      Parameters:
      name - File name for the sound with extension

    • killSound

      public void killSound​(java.lang.String name)
      Stop a sound and delete it from memory.
      Parameters:
      name - File name for the sound with extension
